p: The total antioxidant capacity of the liver ( p = 0.049) and the duodenal mucosa ( p = 0.011) was affected by Hmix intake. Duodenal TAC was also significantly affected by the Hmix Ã— Zn interaction ( p = 0.020) and was significantly increased in all supplemented groups compared with the CON group. Antioxidant capacity of the ileal mucosa was affected by both the Hmix ( p = 0.004) and Zn ( p < 0.001), with the highest values occuring in lambs fed a combination of Hmix and Zn compared to the CON group ( p < 0.001) and both experimental treatments ( p < 0.05). No significant effects on the TAC of serum, kidney, and jejunal mucosa were observed due to treatment ( Table 3 and Table 4).
